XENCrypto","name":"","type":"address"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"}],"devdoc":{"events":{"Burn(address,uint256)":{"details":"Emitted when calling {burnBatch} function for `userAddress`  which burns `batchNumber` * 2500000 tokens"},"FeesClaimed(uint256,address,uint256)":{"details":"Emitted when `account` claims an amount of `fees` in native token through {claimFees} in `cycle`."},"NewCycleStarted(uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Emitted when calling {burnBatch} marking the new current `cycle`, `calculatedCycleReward` and `summedCycleStakes`."},"RewardsClaimed(uint256,address,uint256)":{"details":"Emitted when `account` claims `amount` DBX  token rewards through {claimRewards} in `cycle`."},"Staked(uint256,address,uint256)":{"details":"Emitted when `account` stakes `amount` DBX tokens through {stake} in `cycle`."},"Unstaked(uint256,address,uint256)":{"details":"Emitted when `account` unstakes `amount` DBX tokens through {unstake} in `cycle`."}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"burnBatch(uint256)":{"details":"Burn batchNumber * 2.500.000 tokens  ","params":{"batchNumber":"number of batches"}},"claimFees()":{"details":"Transfers newly accrued fees to sender's address."},"claimRewards()":{"details":"Mints newly accrued account rewards and transfers the entire  allocated amount to the transaction sender address."},"constructor":{"params":{"forwarder":"forwarder contract address.","xenAddress":"XEN contract address."}},"getCurrentCycle()":{"details":"Returns the index of the cycle at the current block time."},"onTokenBurned(address,uint256)":{"details":"implements IBurnRedeemable interface for burning XEN and completing update for state"},"stake(uint256)":{"details":"Stakes the given amount and increases the share of the daily allocated fees. The tokens are transfered from sender account to this contract. To receive the tokens back, the unstake function must be called by the same account address. ","params":{"amount":"token amount to be staked (in wei)."}},"supportsInterface(bytes4)":{"details":"confirms support for IBurnRedeemable interfaces"},"unstake(uint256)":{"details":"Unstakes the given amount and decreases the share of the daily allocated fees. If the balance is availabe, the tokens are transfered from this contract to the sender account. ","params":{"amount":"token amount to be unstaked (in wei)."}}},"version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{"MAX_BPS()":{"notice":"Basis points representation of 100 percent."},"SCALING_FACTOR()":{"notice":"Used to minimise division remainder when earned fees are calculated."},"XEN_BATCH_AMOUNT()":{"notice":"Amount of XEN tokens per batch"},"accAccruedFees(address)":{"notice":"The fee amount the account can withdraw."},"accCycleBatchesBurned(address)":{"notice":"The amount of batches an account has burned. Resets during a new cycle when an account performs an action that updates its stats."},"accFirstStake(address)":{"notice":"Cycle in which an account's stake is locked and begins generating fees."},"accRewards(address)":{"notice":"Current unclaimed rewards and staked amounts per account."},"accSecondStake(address)":{"notice":"Same as accFirstStake, but stores the second stake seperately  in case the account stakes in two consecutive active cycles."},"accStakeCycle(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Amount an account has staked and is locked during given cycle."},"accWithdrawableStake(address)":{"notice":"Stake amount an account can currently withdraw."},"currentCycle()":{"notice":"Index (0-based) of the current cycle.  Updated upon cycle setup that is triggered by contract interraction  (account burn tokens, claims fees, claims rewards, stakes or unstakes)."},"currentCycleReward()":{"notice":"Reward token amount allocated for the current cycle."},"currentStartedCycle()":{"notice":"Helper variable to store the index of the last active cycle."},"cycleAccruedFees(uint256)":{"notice":"The total amount of accrued fees per cycle."},"cycleFeesPerStakeSummed(uint256)":{"notice":"Sum of previous total cycle accrued fees divided by cycle stake."},"cycleTotalBatchesBurned(uint256)":{"notice":"The total amount of batches all accounts have burned per cycle."},"dxn()":{"notice":"DBXen Reward Token contract. Initialized in constructor."},"i_initialTimestamp()":{"notice":"Contract creation timestamp. Initialized in constructor."},"i_periodDuration()":{"notice":"Length of a reward distribution cycle.  Initialized in contstructor to 1 day."},"lastActiveCycle(address)":{"notice":"The last cycle in which an account has burned."},"lastCycleReward()":{"notice":"Reward token amount allocated for the previous cycle."},"lastFeeUpdateCycle(address)":{"notice":"The last cycle in which the account had its fees updated."},"lastStartedCycle()":{"notice":"Helper variable to store the index of the last active cycle."},"pendingFees()":{"notice":"Accumulates fees while there are no tokens staked after the entire token supply has been distributed. Once tokens are staked again, these fees will be distributed in the next active cycle."},"pendingStake()":{"notice":"Helper variable to store pending stake amount.   "},"pendingStakeWithdrawal()":{"notice":"Stores the amount of stake that will be subracted from the total stake once a new cycle starts."},"previousStartedCycle()":{"notice":"Stores the index of the penultimate active cycle plus one."},"rewardPerCycle(uint256)":{"notice":"Total token rewards allocated per cycle."},"summedCycleStakes(uint256)":{"notice":"Total unclaimed token reward and stake.   Updated when a new cycle starts and when an account claims rewards, stakes or unstakes externally owned tokens."},"totalNumberOfBatchesBurned()":{"notice":"Total amount of batches burned"},"xen()":{"notice":"XEN Token contract. Initialized in constructor."}},"notice":"Main DBXen protocol contract used to burn xen tokens, allocate DBXen token rewards, distribute native token fees, stake and deployedGeneratedSources.name: #utility.yul

documentation.text:
Main DBXen protocol contract used to burn xen tokens,
 allocate DBXen token rewards, distribute native token fees, stake and unstake.

DBXen Reward Token contract.
 Initialized in constructor.

XEN Token contract.
 Initialized in constructor.
Basis points representation of 100 percent.
Amount of XEN tokens per batch
Used to minimise division remainder when earned fees are calculated.

Contract creation timestamp.
 Initialized in constructor.

Length of a reward distribution cycle. 
 Initialized in contstructor to 1 day.
Reward token amount allocated for the current cycle.
Reward token amount allocated for the previous cycle.
Helper variable to store pending stake amount.

Index (0-based) of the current cycle.
 
 Updated upon cycle setup that is triggered by contract interraction 
 (account burn tokens, claims fees, claims rewards, stakes or unstakes).
Helper variable to store the index of the last active cycle.
Stores the index of the penultimate active cycle plus one.
Helper variable to store the index of the last active cycle.

Stores the amount of stake that will be subracted from the total
 stake once a new cycle starts.

Accumulates fees while there are no tokens staked after the
 entire token supply has been distributed. Once tokens are
 staked again, these fees will be distributed in the next
 active cycle.
Total amount of batches burned

The amount of batches an account has burned.
 Resets during a new cycle when an account performs an action
 that updates its stats.
The total amount of batches all accounts have burned per cycle.
The last cycle in which an account has burned.
Current unclaimed rewards and staked amounts per account.
The fee amount the account can withdraw.
Total token rewards allocated per cycle.

Total unclaimed token reward and stake. 
 
 Updated when a new cycle starts and when an account claims rewards, stakes or unstakes externally owned tokens.
The last cycle in which the account had its fees updated.
The total amount of accrued fees per cycle.
Sum of previous total cycle accrued fees divided by cycle stake.
Amount an account has staked and is locked during given cycle.
Stake amount an account can currently withdraw.
Cycle in which an account's stake is locked and begins generating fees.

Same as accFirstStake, but stores the second stake seperately 
 in case the account stakes in two consecutive active cycles.

@dev Emitted when `account` claims an amount of `fees` in native token
 through {claimFees} in `cycle`.

@dev Emitted when `account` stakes `amount` DBX tokens through
 {stake} in `cycle`.

@dev Emitted when `account` unstakes `amount` DBX tokens through
 {unstake} in `cycle`.

@dev Emitted when `account` claims `amount` DBX 
 token rewards through {claimRewards} in `cycle`.

@dev Emitted when calling {burnBatch} marking the new current `cycle`,
 `calculatedCycleReward` and `summedCycleStakes`.

@dev Emitted when calling {burnBatch} function for
 `userAddress`  which burns `batchNumber` * 2500000 tokens

 @param xenAddress XEN contract address.

documentation.text:
@dev Burn batchNumber * 2.500.000 tokens 
 
 @param batchNumber number of batches

@dev Mints newly accrued account rewards and transfers the entire 
 allocated amount to the transaction sender address.
@dev Transfers newly accrued fees to sender's address.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "DBXen: amount greater than withdrawable stake"

arguments.value: DBXen: amount greater than withdrawable stake

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "DBXen: amount greater than withdrawable stake"

documentation.text: @dev Returns the index of the cycle at the current block time.
@dev Updates the index of the cycle.
@dev Updates the global helper variables related to fee distribution.

@dev Updates the global state related to starting a new cycle along 
 with helper state variables used in computation of staking rewards.
@dev confirms support for IBurnRedeemable interfaces

Burn(address,uint256).details: Emitted when calling {burnBatch} function for `userAddress`  which burns `batchNumber` * 2500000 tokens

FeesClaimed(uint256,address,uint256).details: Emitted when `account` claims an amount of `fees` in native token through {claimFees} in `cycle`.

NewCycleStarted(uint256,uint256,uint256).details: Emitted when calling {burnBatch} marking the new current `cycle`, `calculatedCycleReward` and `summedCycleStakes`.

RewardsClaimed(uint256,address,uint256).details: Emitted when `account` claims `amount` DBX  token rewards through {claimRewards} in `cycle`.

Staked(uint256,address,uint256).details: Emitted when `account` stakes `amount` DBX tokens through {stake} in `cycle`.

Unstaked(uint256,address,uint256).details: Emitted when `account` unstakes `amount` DBX tokens through {unstake} in `cycle`.

claimFees().details: Transfers newly accrued fees to sender's address.

claimRewards().details: Mints newly accrued account rewards and transfers the entire  allocated amount to the transaction sender address.

getCurrentCycle().details: Returns the index of the cycle at the current block time.

onTokenBurned(address,uint256).details: implements IBurnRedeemable interface for burning XEN and completing update for state

stake(uint256).details: Stakes the given amount and increases the share of the daily allocated fees. The tokens are transfered from sender account to this contract. To receive the tokens back, the unstake function must be called by the same account address.

params.amount: token amount to be staked (in wei).

unstake(uint256).details: Unstakes the given amount and decreases the share of the daily allocated fees. If the balance is availabe, the tokens are transfered from this contract to the sender account.

params.amount: token amount to be unstaked (in wei).

SCALING_FACTOR().notice: Used to minimise division remainder when earned fees are calculated.

XEN_BATCH_AMOUNT().notice: Amount of XEN tokens per batch

accAccruedFees(address).notice: The fee amount the account can withdraw.

accCycleBatchesBurned(address).notice: The amount of batches an account has burned. Resets during a new cycle when an account performs an action that updates its stats.

accFirstStake(address).notice: Cycle in which an account's stake is locked and begins generating fees.

accRewards(address).notice: Current unclaimed rewards and staked amounts per account.

accSecondStake(address).notice: Same as accFirstStake, but stores the second stake seperately  in case the account stakes in two consecutive active cycles.

accStakeCycle(address,uint256).notice: Amount an account has staked and is locked during given cycle.

accWithdrawableStake(address).notice: Stake amount an account can currently withdraw.

currentCycle().notice: Index (0-based) of the current cycle.  Updated upon cycle setup that is triggered by contract interraction  (account burn tokens, claims fees, claims rewards, stakes or unstakes).

currentCycleReward().notice: Reward token amount allocated for the current cycle.

currentStartedCycle().notice: Helper variable to store the index of the last active cycle.

cycleAccruedFees(uint256).notice: The total amount of accrued fees per cycle.

cycleFeesPerStakeSummed(uint256).notice: Sum of previous total cycle accrued fees divided by cycle stake.

cycleTotalBatchesBurned(uint256).notice: The total amount of batches all accounts have burned per cycle.

dxn().notice: DBXen Reward Token contract. Initialized in constructor.

i_initialTimestamp().notice: Contract creation timestamp. Initialized in constructor.

i_periodDuration().notice: Length of a reward distribution cycle.  Initialized in contstructor to 1 day.

lastActiveCycle(address).notice: The last cycle in which an account has burned.

lastCycleReward().notice: Reward token amount allocated for the previous cycle.

lastFeeUpdateCycle(address).notice: The last cycle in which the account had its fees updated.

lastStartedCycle().notice: Helper variable to store the index of the last active cycle.

pendingFees().notice: Accumulates fees while there are no tokens staked after the entire token supply has been distributed. Once tokens are staked again, these fees will be distributed in the next active cycle.

pendingStake().notice: Helper variable to store pending stake amount.

pendingStakeWithdrawal().notice: Stores the amount of stake that will be subracted from the total stake once a new cycle starts.

previousStartedCycle().notice: Stores the index of the penultimate active cycle plus one.

rewardPerCycle(uint256).notice: Total token rewards allocated per cycle.

summedCycleStakes(uint256).notice: Total unclaimed token reward and stake.   Updated when a new cycle starts and when an account claims rewards, stakes or unstakes externally owned tokens.

xen().notice: XEN Token contract. Initialized in constructor.

userdoc.notice: Main DBXen protocol contract used to burn xen tokens, allocate DBXen token rewards, distribute native token fees, stake and unstake.
